function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Forced closures of service businesses","Impact":"Loss of revenue, economic hardship for businesses","Mitigation":"Implementing alternative revenue streams, government financial support","Technologies":"E-commerce platforms, online booking systems","People":"Owners, employees, customers","Owner":"Business owners, government"},{"Description":"High demand for certain services beyond capacity","Impact":"Strain on resources, potential spread of infections due to overcrowding","Mitigation":"Scaling up resources, implementing crowd control measures","Technologies":"Logistics management systems, crowd monitoring systems","People":"Owners, employees, customers","Owner":"Business owners"}]}
